dc.title: Summer Internships in Science & Technology
dc.description: Fermilab SIST focuses on giving opportunities in Science and Technology to students enrolled in four-year colleges in the USA. Internships are offered in physics, electrical engineering, computer programming and mechanical engineering. These internships offer a chance for approximately twenty college students to work with Fermilab scientists or engineers on a project within the context of laboratory research.
